alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 7:10PM CDT until June 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTY... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles northeast of Robertsdale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Baldwin County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
